hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H RSI Divergence + Volume Confirmation Timing Edge
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC forms a bullish RSI divergence on the 4-hour chart (price makes lower low, RSI makes higher low) AND is accompanied by a 15%+ increase in volume relative to the 20-period average on the divergence candle, a long entry will yield positive risk-adjusted returns within the next 24 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: RSI divergence suggests weakening momentum in the prevailing downtrend. Volume confirmation filters out false divergences by indicating increased institutional or smart money interest at the supposed reversal point. The 4H timeframe provides enough signal stability while the 24-hour window captures the initial impulse move.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H chart: Price makes a lower low compared to prior swing low
BTC 4H RSI(14) makes a higher low compared to prior RSI low
Entry on close of the candle following the divergence candle

exit_conditions.time_exit: 24 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Backtest shows < 1.0 Sharpe ratio or win rate < 55% across 100+ instances in NEUTRAL/BULL regimes over past 3 years.
